title: nutin toolkit
catchphrase: Build SPAs by understanding SPAs. A minimal frontend toolkit crafted for learning and lean applications.
pitch:
Have you ever wondered what happens under the hood of the frameworks you use daily? nutin started as a learning journey to understand the core concepts that power modern frontend development.

While major frameworks excel at complex applications, sometimes you need something simpler for personal projects, prototypes, or educational purposes. nutin gives you the SPA experience without the framework overhead â€”and more importantly, without the magic.

philosophy:
I built nutin to demystify frontend frameworks. By implementing core concepts like reactivity, component lifecycles, and client-side routing from scratch, I gained a deeper understanding of the tools I use.

This isn't about replacing Vue or Angular â€”it's about understanding them better. The code is intentionally minimal and accessible because the goal is learning through doing. Every piece is there to examine, modify, and learn from.
